body.p:
With the introduction of the Publishing Template concept in version 20.0, the old WebHelp output template formats are no longer supported. However, they can be easily converted to the new format by following this procedure:
Set to point to the DITA-OT distribution that contains your old template. To do this, follow this procedureâ€¦ This step is required by to pick up the templates you used in your previous version.
Duplicate the WebHelp Responsive built-in scenario.
Select your old custom template in the Templates tab.
Click on the Save Template as... button, fill-in the required fields, then save the template.
Go to Options->Preferences->DITA and choose Built-in DITA-OT 2.x.
Duplicate the WebHelp Responsive built-in scenario, then use the Choose custom template action to load the template previously recovered.
Save the scenario and use it to generate the WebHelp Responsive output.
